definition: straight/to straighten/fair and reasonable/frank/straightforward/(indicates continuing motion or action)/vertical/vertical downward stroke in Chinese characters
surname Zhi/Zhi (c. 2000 BC), fifth of the legendary Flame Emperors 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God

sentences.english: But we usually mean by it the immediate, the nuclear family, with some extension.
sentences.chinese: 但通常都是指直系親屬，核心家庭，少量分支。

sentences.english: This code solves a non lineal system using the simple gaussian method.
sentences.chinese: 此代碼解決了非直系系統使用簡單的高斯方法。

sentences.english: My immediate family lives on the other side of the country.
sentences.chinese: 我的直系親屬生活在另一邊的國家。

sentences.english: The direct ancestor of the modern cat was the Kaffir cat of ancient Egypt.
sentences.chinese: 現代貓的直系原種是古埃及的卡菲爾貓。

sentences.english: He is lineally descended from  a respectable family.
sentences.chinese: 他是名門望族的直系後裔。

sentences.english: During direct by Flanagan White says it was his idea.
sentences.chinese: 弗拉納根說在白色的直系後代這是他的主意。

sentences.english: The diagram's immediate children are determined by the list of child model objects returned.
sentences.chinese: 圖的直系子圖是由返回的子模型對象列表確定的。

sentences.english: It occurs three to five times more frequently in first-degree relatives of RLS sufferers.
sentences.chinese: 在患者的直系親屬中，發病率要高上三五倍。

sentences.english: Family is the center of everything, and not just our immediate family.
sentences.chinese: 家庭是一切的中心，不只是我們的直系親屬。

sentences.english: The contestant must not be an employee or immediate family of an employee of Fairchild Group.
sentences.chinese: 參加者不可爲新時代集團之僱員及直系親屬。

sentences.english: There is a high proportion of the elderly living with one married son and formed a lineal family.
sentences.chinese: 只有一個兒子的老年人在直系家庭生活的比例較高。

sentences.english: "Well, do you have any close relatives?"the nun essayed.
sentences.chinese: “那麼，你有直系親屬嗎？”修女試探着問道。

sentences.english: Only immediate family members attended the funeral.
sentences.chinese: 只有直系親屬過來參加了葬禮。

sentences.english: Yeah. Well. there's the direct Royal Family,
They're believed to be direct-line descendants of early migrations from Africa.
sentences.chinese: 科學家們認爲他們是早期走出非洲原始人的直系後裔。

definition: direct line of descent/under one's personal command/school or faction passing on faithfully one's doctrine
collateral relative (descended from a common ancestor but through different lines)
relatives/members of the same family, clan, tribe etc
handed down in a direct line from the founder
